LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipManhunterOnTameFail: Set the chance with which an animal will seek revenge on a failed tame attempt The actual chance is also affected by the tamer's skill
LanguageData.SY_CA.ManhunterOnTameFailRange: Revenge chance on tame fail range
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinManhunterOnTameFail: Set the lowest allowed chance for revenge on a tame fail
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxManhunterOnTameFail: Set the highest allowed for revenge on a tame fail
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipManhunterOnDamage: Set the chance with which an animal will seek revenge when harmed The actual chance is also affected by the hunter's skill, weapon and range to the target
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinManhunterOnDamage: Set the lowest allowed chance for revenge on being harmed
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxManhunterOnDamage: Set the highest allowed chance for revenge on being harmed
